title: Login server error - Please help :D
body:
This has never happened to me until today!

I play on the LAN server sometimes because i find it amusing to play there!

Just recently, i started getting this message when I tried to login. 

When I log into my NA account, i dont get this issue. The LAN server is fine too... which worries me even more. 

Can anyone please help me ! ~ Thanks {{champion:427}} 

https://gyazo.com/b3d8e4c0f72c6213277d14d481e8225c

replies.body:
As far as I know we haven't had any more of those weird login issues in the past few days. I wanted to check to see if your account could have possibly been compromised and the password changed, but you forgot to give me the Summoner name of the LAN account. 

Hit me back up with the LAN Summoner name and I'll double check to make sure everything is okay. In the meantime, you could also reach out to our account team using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) just in case!
Also, ive posted this on reddit and a lot of LAN users are experiencing this too apparently.

Thanks for the heads up! I've double checked that LAN account and it doesn't look like it's been compromised at all, so we're all good on that front!

I've also asked around, and it seems like there might be a few issues with the LAN login servers. I'm going to keep my eye open for this to make sure it isn't a widespread problem, but in the meantime, I would suggest going ahead and shooting us a ticket about that login issue so that we can accurately track this and provide updates!
